attributes.action: Get a fair deal from banks for people on benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Banks discriminate against people on low incomes, that is a fact.  If you want a bank account you have to jump through several hoops such as having a passport(?) or driving licence as proof of who you are.  But what if you can't afford either of these? Then you end up with a bank account that you can't get either direct debits or a debit card with.  And then if you go less than £5 overdrawn even for a few hours you are hit with a charge of around £30.  It is time that this was changed and poorer people got a fair deal.
